description: This file defines a UI component named 'Button' using the LightningJS framework. It specifies a visual template with dynamic text content and behavior for toggling the 'favorited' state upon user input.

classes.name: Button
classes.description: A LightningJS component representing a toggle button with dynamic text labels.

methods.name: template
methods.description: Defines the HTML-like template structure of the Button component with conditional text content.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Initializes the component's reactive state, including 'isFavorited' and label texts.

methods.name: input.enter
methods.description: Event handler that toggles the 'isFavorited' state when the 'enter' input is received.
